duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform thermal-hydraulic analysis of nuclear plant fluid systems, HVAC system and building modeling, motor operated valve (MOV) and air operated valve (AOV) analyses, and mechanical component evaluations.
Review plant design changes and evaluate as-found plant conditions for nuclear power stations.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of engineering analysis, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor degree in Engineering, Mechanical Engineering preferred, similar degrees will be considered (Master's degree is a plus)
